title: No More Shroud of Doubt?
post: Reading the comments, the bloggers at WND are even more simple-minded and misled than those on Fr Longenecker’s site I checked out a few days ago.  When I read that some actually and earnestly believe that Muslims worship Satan every day of the week, I give up. Who’s feeding this crap out there?
author: daveb of wellington nz

title: No More Shroud of Doubt?
post: I have been attempting to keep up with as much info. on the Shroud for many years. Although not all the info. was as positive as I believed on the inside of my spirit, but I always kept the faith, believing on those things on which I can not see, just be believing, God never fail’s, He has always come through. Now, there will alway’s be those skeptist in this world, and for those who still have doubt, I praythe Holy Spirit will come upon you, and reveal the truth to you, as He has me. I am thankful for all those who has worked hard to show those who still are doubtful of the Truth.
author: michaels57
